comment: /**  * Determine the {@link MimeType} of a message from the given MessageHeaders.  * @param headers the headers to use for the resolution  * @return the resolved {@code MimeType}, or {@code null} if none found  * @throws InvalidMimeTypeException if the content type is a String that cannot be parsed  * @throws IllegalArgumentException if there is a content type but its type is unknown  */
code: /**  * Determine the {@link MimeType} of a message from the given MessageHeaders.  * @param headers the headers to use for the resolution  * @return the resolved {@code MimeType}, or {@code null} if none found  * @throws InvalidMimeTypeException if the content type is a String that cannot be parsed  * @throws IllegalArgumentException if there is a content type but its type is unknown  */ @Nullable MimeType resolve(@Nullable MessageHeaders headers) throws InvalidMimeTypeException.
